name: sower
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or machine that sows seeds (= puts them in the ground so they will grow): In the parable, the sower scatters seed liberally and inefficiently. They were given four wheat sowers and various other machinery.
someone who causes something to begin somewhere so that it will grow or continue: The traditional sowers of culture were the schoolteachers. She believes a good Christian should be a sower of joy.
More examplesFewer examplesA sower went out to sow his seed.The seeds of desire spring up where the sower has sown them.
